member.name: ID2D1StrokeStyle.GetDashCap
member.summary: Gets a value that specifies how the ends of each dash are drawn.
member.returns: A value that specifies how the ends of each dash are drawn.

member.name: ID2D1StrokeStyle.GetDashes
member.summary: Copies the dash pattern to the specified array.
member.param: A pointer to an array that will receive the dash pattern. The array must be able to contain at least as many elements as specified by dashesCount. You must allocate storage for this array.

The number of dashes to copy. If this value is less than the number of dashes in the stroke style's dashes array, the returned dashes are truncated to dashesCount. If this value is greater than the number of dashes in the stroke style's dashes array, the extra dashes are set to 0.0f. To obtain the actual number of dashes in the stroke style's dashes array, use the method.

member.name: ID2D1StrokeStyle.GetDashesCount
member.summary: Retrieves the number of entries in the dashes array.
member.returns: The number of entries in the dashes array if the stroke is dashed; otherwise, 0.

member.name: ID2D1StrokeStyle.GetDashOffset
member.summary: Retrieves a value that specifies how far in the dash sequence the stroke will start.
member.returns: A value that specifies how far in the dash sequence the stroke will start.

member.name: ID2D1StrokeStyle.GetDashStyle
member.summary: Gets a value that describes the stroke's dash pattern.
member.returns: A value that describes the predefined dash pattern used, or if a custom dash style is used.

member.name: ID2D1StrokeStyle.GetEndCap
member.summary: Retrieves the type of shape used at the end of a stroke.
member.returns: The type of shape used at the end of a stroke.

member.name: ID2D1StrokeStyle.GetLineJoin
member.summary: Retrieves the type of joint used at the vertices of a shape's outline.
member.returns: A value that specifies the type of joint used at the vertices of a shape's outline.

member.name: ID2D1StrokeStyle.GetMiterLimit
member.summary: Retrieves the limit on the ratio of the miter length to half the stroke's thickness.
member.returns: A positive number greater than or equal to 1.0f that describes the limit on the ratio of the miter length to half the stroke's thickness.

member.name: ID2D1StrokeStyle.GetStartCap
member.summary: Retrieves the type of shape used at the beginning of a stroke.
member.returns: The type of shape used at the beginning of a stroke.

member.name: ID2D1StrokeStyle
member.summary: Describes the caps, miter limit, line join, and dash information for a stroke.
